document_data.mainbody:
Forge of Fangs is an adventure module set in the Forgotten Realms using the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition ruleset. It is part of the Waterdeep series of adventures published for the D&D Adventurers League. It focuses on Undermountain, and is an adventure designed for 11- to 16-level characters. It is part three of the Undying Threat Trilogy.
Characters
Artor Morlin • Jenin Greycastle • Keresta Delvingstone • Layela Greycastle • Seabordt • Tithanil
Keresta Delvingstone
Creatures
chasme • crocodile • darkmantle • ghast • human • vampire • vampire spawn • zombie
Locations
Dungeons Undermountain
Inns & Taverns Yawning Portal
Region Sword Coast
Settlements Waterdeep
Magic
Items ring of shooting stars • shroud of vampiric illusion
Spells banishment • bestow curse • command • control water • cure wounds • dispel magic • divination • greater restoration • guardian of faith • hold person • identify • inflict wounds • insect plague • lesser restoration • light • mending • prayer of healing • protection from evil and good • raise dead • remove curse • resistance • revivify • sacred flame • shield of faith • silence • speak with dead • spirit guardians • spiritual weapon • thaumaturgy • true resurrection
Plants
shrieker • violet fungus
Organizations
Player Factions  Emerald Enclave • Harpers • Lords Alliance • Order of the Gauntlet • Zhentarim
* D&D Adventurers League Guildmaster Chris Lindsay
* D&D Adventurers League Wizards Team Chris Lindsay, Adam Lee, Mike Mearls, Ari Levitch
* D&D Adventurers League Administrator(s) Claire Hoffman, Lysa Chen, Travis Woodall, Greg Marks, Alan Patrick, Amy Lynn Dzura
* Art Director and Graphic Designer Rich Lescouflair
* Playtesters Steve Bornstein, Brian Cortijo, Ian Odell, Sandra Odell
